name: Jugular 3 (RPG Maker Horror Short)
description:
Barren got cancer from the damn radiation in the air. The group was devastated but I offered to get the only cure....The heart of a Demogorgon. A ferocious beast that traps his victims in a separate reality. These beasts like to play with their prey before hunting them down.

Jenni didn't like the idea but it's the group that really shoves the pressure down your throat. Maybe they are right, Barren's life is in my hands. And if I don't save his life, my existence here with these people will become hell.

The whole group can go to hell. Making me feel I need to do this shit. I'm probably the only bad-ass in this god forsaken group.
